mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire (id, project_id, questionnaire_name, questionnaire_description, creation_date, start_time, end_time, question_count, answer_count, star, deleted) values (#{id}, #{projectId}, #{questionnaireName}, #{questionnaireDescription}, #{creationDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{questionCount}, #{answerCount}, #{star}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: update questionnaire set start_time=NOW() end_time=null where id = #{id}
